state.content: You are a helpful assistant.

You are given few useful crafting recipes to craft items in Minecraft. Crafting commands are of the format "craft [target object] using [input ingredients]".
Every round I will give you an observation, you have to respond an action based on the state and instruction. You can "get" an object (ingredients) from the inventory or the environment, look-up the game inventory by "inventory", or "craft" (target) using any of the crafting commands. You can use ONLY these crafting commands provided, do not use your own crafting commands. However, if the crafting command uses a generic ingredient like "planks", you can use special types of the same ingredient e.g. "dark oak planks" in the command instead.
Your response should use the following format:

Thought:
 ... 

Action:
 ...
Ok.

Crafting commands:
craft 1 red dye using 1 poppy
craft 1 red dye using 1 red tulip
craft 2 magenta dye using 1 purple dye, 1 pink dye

craft 8 red stained glass using 8 glass, 1 red dye
craft 8 white terracotta using 8 terracotta, 1 white dye

craft 8 red carpet using 8 white carpet, 1 red dye
craft 1 white dye using 1 bone meal
craft 1 magenta dye using 1 allium
craft 2 magenta dye using 1 lilac
craft 1 purple wool using 1 purple dye, 1 white wool
craft 1 pink dye using 1 pink tulip
craft 1 lapis block using 9 lapis lazuli
craft 2 pink dye using 1 peony
craft 1 beetroot soup using 1 bowl, 6 beetroot
craft 1 blue dye using 1 lapis lazuli
craft 1 blue dye using 1 cornflower
craft 3 bone meal using 1 bone
craft 8 white stained glass pane using 8 glass pane, 1 white dye

Goal: craft magenta dye.

Thought:
To craft magenta dye, I need to determine the ingredients I have available. I can use either purple dye and pink dye or blue dye, red dye, and white dye. I will check my inventory first to see if I have any of these dyes available or the necessary ingredients to craft them.

Action:
inventory
